briefTitle: Pegfilgrastim as Support to Advanced Breast Cancer Patients Receiving Chemotherapy
officialTitle: A Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Multicenter, Randomized Study Evaluating the Prophylactic Use of Pegfilgrastim on the Incidence of Febrile Neutropenia in Subjects With Advanced Breast Cancer Treated With Single Agent Docetaxel
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Proportion of subjects developing febrile neutropenia
eligibilityCriteria:
* Advanced breast cancer
* 18 years of age or older
* Patients who will be receiving Taxotere (docetaxel) chemotherapy
